articles.description: England's Tommy Fleetwood secures the winning point as Europe regain the Ryder Cup in dramatic fashion in Rome.
articles.title: Europe regain Ryder Cup on dramatic day in Rome

articles.description: Watch key moments as Europe regain the Ryder Cup with victory over the United States in Rome.
articles.title: Watch: Key moments as Europe regain Ryder Cup

articles.description: Watch and follow updates as Aston Villa host Manchester United in the first of six matches as the WSL season gets under way.
articles.title: WSL: Watch Aston Villa v Man Utd - first of six games on opening day

articles.description: Follow live commentary and text updates from the Rugby World Cup as South Africa play Tonga in Marseille.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: South Africa v Tonga - radio & text

articles.description: Miri Taylor's second-half strike gives Liverpool a surprise 1-0 Women's Super League win at Arsenal in front of 54,115 fans.
articles.title: Liverpool win at Arsenal in front of record crowd

articles.description: Watch BBC Two live on BBC iPlayer.
articles.title: Golf: Ryder Cup Highlights. VideoGolf: Ryder Cup Highlights

articles.description: Rory McIlroy fights back tears of joy instead of disappointment after contributing a career-best performance to help Europe regain the Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Row 'fuels' emotional McIlroy in Ryder Cup redemption

articles.description: Ten-man Nottingham Forest fight back from a goal down to draw with Brentford as Nicolas Dominguez's first goal earns the hosts a point.
articles.title: Ten-man Forest fight back to draw with Brentford

articles.description: Australia keep their slim hopes of reaching the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals alive with a win over Portugal in their final Pool C match.
articles.title: Australia keep knockout hopes alive with Portugal win

articles.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars kick off this year's NFL international series with a comfortable win over the Atlanta Falcons at Wembley.
articles.title: Jaguars beat Falcons for first Wembley win since 2017
